vote.title: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for repairs, maintenance, and support for air blowers, compressors, and dryers used in the water purification and wastewater treatment processes for the Dallas Water Utilities Department - BCV Systems, LLC in the estimated amount of $844,721.90, FCX Performance, Inc. in the estimated amount of $314,689.00, and Anytime Pump Service Company dba CIE in the estimated amount of $35,850.00, most advantageous proposers of three - Total estimated amount of $1,195,260.90 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for repairs, maintenance, and support for air blowers, compressors, and dryers used in the water purification and wastewater treatment processes for the Dallas Water Utilities Department - BCV Systems, LLC in the estimated amount of $844,721.90, FCX Performance, Inc. in the estimated amount of $314,689.00, and Anytime Pump Service Company dba CIE in the estimated amount of $35,850.00, most advantageous proposers of three - Total estimated amount of $1,195,260.90 - Financing:  Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
